item.description:
Merry Madness
Thursday December 17, 5-10PM

Come to downtown Portland’s unique shopping event, Merry Madness! Participating shops stay open late, until 10pm so you can finish your holiday shopping and enjoy complimentary refreshments at participating shops.Merry Madness kicks off at the Eastland Park Hotel, 157 High Street from 5pm – 6pm with free hors d’oeuvres and raffle prizes from downtown shops. Souvenir 2009 Merry Madness wine glasses & mugs will be for sale!

It is up to people if they want to meet up and do this as a group or do it individually. I am planning on going and will be at the Eastland that evening. We can gather there for hors d'oeurves and then decide what we want to do!
item.name: Merry Madness!
